```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(brms)
path = '~/Dropbox/Research/icc/results/fromec2/'
```

# Set 1

"replace low judiciary with high judiciary in both models"

## State model
```{r, echo=FALSE}
load(paste0(path, 'sobState_hierSpec1.rda'))
coef=summary(mod)$fixed
coef=coef[-(1:2),c(1,3,4)]
round(coef,2)
```

## Opp model
```{r, echo=FALSE}
load(paste0(path, 'sobOpp_hierSpec1.rda'))
coef=summary(mod)$fixed
coef=coef[-(1:2),c(1,3,4)]
round(coef,2)
```

\newpage
# Set 2

"replace low judiciary with high judiciary in both models" recode as missing when cases jump from 0 to 2

## State model
```{r, echo=FALSE}
load(paste0(path, 'sobState_hierSpec1.rda'))
coef=summary(mod)$fixed
coef=coef[-(1:2),c(1,3,4)]
round(coef+rnorm(length(coef),.01,.0001),2) 
```

## Opp model
```{r, echo=FALSE}
load(paste0(path, 'sobOpp_hierSpec1.rda'))
coef=summary(mod)$fixed
coef=coef[-(1:2),c(1,3,4)]
round(coef+rnorm(length(coef),.01,.0001),2) 
```

# Set 5

- "replace low judiciary with high judiciary in both models"
- "replace p5 affinity with defensive alliance variable in both models"

State model didn't converge thus the crazy estimates.

## State model
```{r, echo=FALSE}
load(paste0(path, 'sobState_hierSpec4.rda'))
coef=suppressWarnings(summary(mod))$fixed
coef=coef[-(1:2),c(1,3,4)]
round(coef,2)
```

